Condition_summary_1: Inspection reports with dated and annotated photographs during pre-construction, construction, and post-construction periods.
Condition_summary_2: Monitoring as per the proposed plan 'Ministry of Transportation – West Region, Highway 401 Grand River Bridge Replacements, Ministry Act Authorization Permit Application Package'.
Condition_summary_3: Contingency measures to prevent greater impacts if mitigation measures fail.
Condition_summary_4: Completion of offsetting measures by December 31, 2024, with as-built surveys and photographic documentation.
Vegetation_Cover: 80% coverage of herbaceous ground cover and seasonal planted stock
Instream_structures: overwintering pool habitat with depths ≥1.7m, boulder clusters as velocity refuge, anchored sweeper trees
